name: Color Cubes (itch) (Cimeto)
description:
'Color Cubes' is  just a simple minigame where your goal is to make all cubes to have the same colour. When you click a cube, it changes its colour and all its neighbours, so to make all the board to share the same colour, you have to think in advance.

The first 3x3 board is very easy, but you can select more difficult boards. Use the buttons on the top to play bigger boards or with more colours.

Colours go from a minimum of two to a maximum of four.

Boards go from the smallest, a 3x3 board, to a strainful 7x7 board.

While the small 3x3 board offers no difficulty at all, the bigger the board the more disheartening the game gets. But if brain games are your thing... give it a try.

The WebGL version have a problem with the lights, everything looks too bright for my taste, so I recommend using the PC version. 

This is a extremely simple game I made in a few hours just to test my skill with Unity a while back. One of my very first tries with the engine, but originally developed with Android in mind. I hope you can enjoy it!

Cheers!
